description:
- Led the migration and upgrade of a multi-million dollar application stack with 70+ applications, transitioning from on-premises data centers to multiple AWS regions
 - Utilized Docker, Bitbucket Pipelines, and AWS CDK to establish a PCI-compliant and fully redundant environment, ensuring scalability and reliability
 - Managed a team of 5 engineers across 3 product stacks, facilitating standups, bi-weekly one-on-ones, and performance reviews to drive team alignment and individual growth
 - Reviewed and approved pull requests to ensure high code quality and compliance with security standards, safeguarding sensitive data including PCI and HIPAA information

- Implemented company-wide adoption of CI/CD pipelines using Bitbucket Pipelines
 - Aided in backend development for a new customer facing product (ExpressJS, TypeScript), advancing it from Beta to GA
 - Managed and executed all legacy production releases, ensuring stability and adherence to test plans
 - Evaluated incoming Jira tickets to assess priority and provide time estimates for completion

- Primary engineer on core web and voice processing application, utilized by the entire customer base, handling up to 10,000 concurrent connections during peak traffic (PHP/JS)
 - Shipped 20+ releases on a weekly cadence, enhancing customersâ€™ web and voice experience with minimal service disruption
 - Contributed to AI product development on a modern stack (Python FastAPI)
 - Coordinated and ran code review meeting among team members to ensure company and data security best practices were being met in a relaxed collaborative environment

- Engineered multiple features for core voice application, integrating live with AWS DynamoDB, AWS S3, AWS Polly, and Google Dialogflow (PHP).
 - Redesigned and optimized logs database with PostgreSQL, enhancing capacity and query speed.
 - Contributed to core application upgrade from PHP5.3 to PHP7

- Designed and coded RESTful API endpoints, enhancing customer control and accelerating information retrieval for applications.
- Architected and developed custom PHP voice applications per customer specifications.
